name: Boundary (itch) (capitolhmr)
description:
Boundary is an audiovisual piece exploring sonification of visual information, and affect in  interactive media. It consists of two  applications which communicate via local OSC: an interactive 3D environment which  serves as the controller for the piece, and the Max application which drives the sound.

This project is built using Unity, including Thomas Fredericks's UnityOSC package http://thomasfredericks.github.io/Uni..., and Max/MSP.
